CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 22, 1951, pg. A2 reads: "Police Critic - Dr. Reginald Dixon, center, and his attorneys, Joseph W. Givens, left, and Richard F. Jones, right, as they left hearing of Police Trial Board last week after Dr. Dixon charged police with terrorism in coming to his home and forcing him to accompany them to the police station. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. Reginald Dixon, center, and his attorneys Richard F. Jones, right and Joseph W. Givens, left, posed in office, possibly in Allegheny County Courthouse
